text:
Any writers still up? Got a prompt for you. Take a look at the scene in this photo—it feels eerie, even emotional, even though there aren't any people in it.

Now see if you can tell the story of this scene in exactly 6 words: https://t.co/1ouVPKiQXQ

domain.name: Person
domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela

domain.name: Actor
domain.description: An actor or actress in the world, like Kate Winslet or Leonardo DiCaprio
